lines.i: This class is used to specify the type of substance (e.g. alcohol, controlled substances) that is abused by a patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Code
This coded attribute is used to specify the specific substance abused by patient (e.g. cocaine, oxycodone, etc.,) rather than a code for the type of substance (e.g. narcotics, alcohol, pharmaceutical drugs).
